participant_1.background:
I love to spend my weekends playing hockey, especially when I get to do it with friends.
I paint for a living and my family is very supportive.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
my dad died when i was in high school.
I like to go to the park with my siblings and pretend we are dragon trainers.

participant_2.background:
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i hate mexican food.
i am a guitar player.

content.text: I play guitar and I blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
Nice! My dad died when I was in high school.
I'm sorry to hear that. I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
I understand. I love to go to the park with my siblings and pretend we are dragon trainers.
That sounds like fun! I don't really like Mexican food.
I love Mexican food! I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
Ice cream is delicious! I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
I paint for a living and my family is very supportive.
That's awesome! Do you have a favorite painting that you've done?
I love all of my paintings, but I think my favorite is one that I did of my dog.
That's great! I'm sure your dog loves it.
He does! He always sits in front of it when I'm painting.
Thanks! I love talking about my hobbies.
Me too! I'm glad we got to chat.
